title: Good Job Riot
body: never have i thought that Ivern would be this good, he can do great damage and can be played in the jungle and support role, correct me if i'm wrong but is this the first jungle support type character? i haven't even played ivern but i LOVE seeing him as my jungle or support because he has so much utility, he's like bard imo, even if he's on the other team you won't tilt because you just can't help but love the guy, i love this new champ release, good job riot :)

replies.body: Nunu was the first support jungler, but ivern is still amazing.
Amazing to watch crash and burn, so useless no damage.
